Name: Apple Fool
Ingredients: 15 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of float dehydrated apple slice.
Review: There's no gold in 'Fool's Gold', a mineral called Iron Pyrite (FeS2) that looks like gold. Similarly, there's no apple in this Apple Fool although its crisp enlivening freshness is reminiscent of a good apple.
History: Adapted from a drink created by Aisha Sharpe in New York City, USA.
